original: 《 戰場 》戰鬥時，場上一方最多 5隻武將部隊。一旦有武將陣亡或撤退，再依照出陣排序由軍團中出陣新武將，直到全部武將上陣。
text: When fighting in "Battlefield", there are at most 5 generals on the field. Once a general dies or retreats, new generals will be deployed from the legion according to the order of their ranks until all generals are in battle.
